instruments.name: LAI-2200C Plant Canopy Analyzer (LI-COR Environmental)
instruments.description: Optical instrument for measuring Leaf Area Index (LAI) and canopy structure using canopy gap fraction and radiation measurements.
instruments.short: Measures Leaf Area Index and canopy structure.

instruments.name: SPAD-502 Chlorophyll Meter
instruments.description: Handheld chlorophyll meter providing rapid SPAD readings to estimate leaf chlorophyll content and plant health in the field.
instruments.short: Handheld chlorophyll (SPAD) meter for leaf chlorophyll content.

instruments.name: Phenomet Tower
instruments.description: A field-deployed tower mounting sensors (NDVI, PAR, temperature/humidity) for continuous phenology observations and canopy monitoring.
instruments.short: Field tower for continuous phenology & canopy observations.

instruments.name: Terrestrial LiDAR Scanner (TLS)
instruments.description: High-resolution ground-based LiDAR scanner for 3D canopy and terrain mapping, structural analysis, and biomass estimation.
instruments.short: Ground-based LiDAR for 3D canopy & terrain mapping.

instruments.name: Laser Range Finder
instruments.description: Portable laser distance meter for accurate distance and slope measurements during field surveys.
instruments.short: Handheld laser distance meter for field measurements.

instruments.name: Handheld GPS (Survey)
instruments.description: Handheld GPS unit used for field location capture and transect positioning (survey-grade if RTK-enabled).
instruments.short: Handheld GPS for field location capture.

instruments.name: Nikon DSLR Camera with DHP Lens
instruments.description: High-resolution DSLR camera suitable for plot photography, field documentation and image-based canopy analysis with a DHP (digital hemispherical photography) lens.
instruments.short: DSLR camera equipped for hemispherical canopy photography.
